Subject: Unable to login to AIC site
Description: I am unable to log in to AIC site. Error "Unable to contact the SQL Server Database"
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom:
I am unable to log in to AIC site. Error "Unable to contact the SQL Server Database"

Cause:
SQL Server Data and Logs drive was very low in space. We added some space to both drives

Resolution:
The Database that was consuming all the Disk space was for Netwrix Threat Prevention (NTP) formally StealthINTERCEPT Server (SI).
Configured the NTP Database Maintenance to correctly maintain the NVMonitorData DB.

REF: Netwrix StealthlNTERCEPT v7.3 > Administration > Navigation & Configuration of the Sl Admin Console > Database Maintenance Window > Configure Database Maintenance
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/StealthINTERCEPT_7.3/page/Content/StealthINTERCEPT/Admin_Console_User_Guide/Menu_Windows/Database_Maintenance_Window/Configure_Database_Maintenance.htm

**NOTE** If this is in configured and not correctly working then there account is missing needed permissions to correctly preform the Database Maintenance.
REF: Netwrix StealthlNTERCEPT v7.3 > Requirements > SQL Server Requirements > Database Maintenance Feature Requirements
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/StealthINTERCEPT_7.3/page/Content/StealthINTERCEPT/System_Requirements/SQLServerDBMaintenance.htm
